name: Kazi Mahasin Azim
title: Entrepreneur | Business Coach | Motivational Speaker | Social Reformer
audience: Business owners looking to scale sustainably

bio.story: Dropped out of law college to pursue practical skills. Founded EME Academy in 2016 to solve India's skill gap. Worked in Saudi Arabia, started multiple ventures, authored a bestselling business book, and runs a successful magazine.
achievements: Published 'How to Become a Successful Businessman'

coachingPrograms.title: Private 1:1 Business Coaching
coachingPrograms.description: Weekly personalized guidance to launch and grow your business.

coachingPrograms.title: Youth Entrepreneurship Bootcamp
coachingPrograms.description: 2-day workshop for youth and job seekers to launch their first business.

coachingPrograms.title: Core Team Strategy Workshops
coachingPrograms.description: Team alignment and strategic planning for small businesses.

speaking.description: Book Sumon for bold and energetic sessions filled with raw personal storytelling and impact-driven insights.

book.title: How to Become a Successful Businessman
book.description: Includes real-world business frameworks, student success stories, and life lessons from failures and travels.

awards.title: Best Placement Institute of the Year – 2024
awards.description: Recognized by the EME Academy board for excellence in student outcomes and placement.

awards.title: EME Academy Star Awards 2025
awards.description: Honored for leadership and commitment to building a culture of success.

vision.quote: Success isn’t about being rich; it’s about making others rise with you.
goals: Build employment-generating industries in underdeveloped districts
Offer free training for financially struggling students
Create an India where no one needs to leave their village

finalNote: I left college not to quit, but to find a different way to rise. Every young person deserves that chance. I’m here to show them how.
